bmc.about.who-am-i.description:
My name is Ives van Hoorne. I'm 22 years, 6 months and 1745131 seconds old and live in Enschede, The Netherlands. 

I'm an ambitious developer, passionate about new technology and its capabilities. I am inspired by fast-growing companies and hope to become the lead of one in the future.
bmc.features.angular-cli: A command line interface for Angular
bmc.features.bootstrap: Responsive layout from battle tested, world most famous UI library
bmc.features.cypress: Cypress is a next generation front end testing tool built for the modern web.
bmc.features.fontawesome: Easy to use vector icons and social logos
bmc.features.lazyloading.description: Faster startup time with lazy loaded feature modules
bmc.features.lazyloading.title: Lazy loading
bmc.features.ngrx: One way data flow powered by RxJS Observables
bmc.features.rxjs: Reactive programming with async collections using Observables
bmc.features.themes.description: Flexible theming support for provided and custom components
bmc.features.themes.title: Themes

bmc.features.typescript: Superior developer experience, code completion, refactoring and less bugs
